sentence.Network_en: The seas have been used as a receptacle for a range of industrial toxins.
sentence.Network_cn: 海洋成了各种有毒工业废料的大容器。

sentence.Network_en: A liquid filters through a strainer, into the receptacle beneath.
sentence.Network_cn: 液体经过过滤器流入下面的容器.

sentence.Network_en: Please put your cigarette ends into the receptacle provided.
sentence.Network_cn: 请将烟蒂放入提供的盛器里.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin receptaculum, from receptare 'receive back', frequentative of recipere (see receive)

entry.def: A receptacle is an object which you use to put or keep things in.

means.word_mean: 1. a container that is used to put or keep things in
2. enlarged tip of a stem that bears the floral parts
3. an electrical (or electronic) fitting that is connected to a source of power and equipped to receive an insert

stems_affixes.word_buile: de坏+cept拿,抓,握住+ive……的→拿坏的东西来→欺骗性的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 易受感染的,易受影响的
stems_affixes.word_buile: sus下+cept拿+ible能……的→能被[病]拿下→易受影响
accept[v.接受;承认]+ability能……→接受能力
con共同+cept拿,抓,握住→共同把握→共同的想法→观念,概念
except[v.&prep.除外]+ion表名词→n.除外,例外
in进入+cept拿,抓,握住+ion动作或状态→开始拿住→开端
per全部+cept拿,抓,握住+ion状态→全部抓住→理解;感知
pre预先+cept拿,抓,握住→预先拿好的话→箴言
re再+ceipt=cept抓→再次拿到→得到的收据
re再+cept拿,抓,握住+acle东西→拿东西的东西→容器
ac再+cept拿,抓,握住→一再拿→接受
inter在……中间+cept拿住→拦截
ex出+cept拿,抓,握住→拿出
de去掉+bacle=acle有block之意,大块东西→去掉大块东西→解冰块

stems_affixes.value_cn: 奇迹,令人惊奇的人[或事]
stems_affixes.word_buile: mir惊奇+acle东西→让人惊奇的东西
ob反对+st+acle……东西,状态→站着反对→障碍[物]
pinn尖+acle……东西,状态→n.尖塔,山峰
re再+cept拿+acle东西→拿东西的东西→容器
tent伸展,触,摸+acle……东西,状态→n.触须、触角,[植物]腺毛
man手+acle东西→手上的东西→手铐
